As <nowiki>[[http://www.guadalinex.org|Guadalinex]]</nowiki> development head, I love Ubuntu. It's an excelent base with short (and predictable) release times.

Our team exchanges knowledge and pieces of code with Ubuntu team. A graphical installer and Hermes (the amazing hardware pluging assistant) are two examples.
